data.eml:eml: Cladistic analysis finds a placement for an enigmatic species, Peyerimhoffia sepei sp. n. (Diptera: Sciaridae), with a note on its spermatophore

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hippa, Heikki, Vilkamaa, Pekka (2005): Cladistic analysis finds a placement for an enigmatic species, Peyerimhoffia sepei sp. n. (Diptera: Sciaridae), with a note on its spermatophore. Zootaxa 1044: 49-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.169861
